caseTitle: The Chairman NAB thr. Prosecutor General, Islamabad v. Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Asif Saeed Khan Khosa
tagline: The merits of the case should not be adverted to or commented upon in any detail while deciding bail/suspension of sentence applications. Bail in NAB cases may be granted in constitutional jurisdiction of a High Court only in extraordinary circumstances and in cases of extreme hardship.
